title: DAO governance-PTUN
body:
The initial IMX airdrop missed some IMX Together participants, this would aim to perform a retro-active airdrop to those missed users and implement a "Claim" UI for those participants.

This PTUN would:

Distribute 5220 IMX to the Merkle distributor, 30 for each missed participant.
Award 160 IMX to McOso for his work developing the Merkle Distributor, Gas for Merkle, and Claim UI.
Award 50 IMX to Taliskye for his efforts deriving the wallets needing an airdrop and coordinating.
author: 0x810d3AABbBf8CbCFf5C256f2B0621c4941f8B139
